title: Mhalabia
description: A light Syrian milk pudding flavored with orange blossom water and topped with crushed pistachios.
instructions: Heat milk in a saucepan over medium heat.
Dissolve cornstarch in a small amount of cold milk and add it to the pot.
Add sugar and stir continuously until thickened.
Remove from heat and add orange blossom water.
Pour into cups and garnish with pistachios.
